00031 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00032 
00033 #if !defined(USE_MEM_HT32F67041) && !defined(USE_MEM_HT32F67051)
00034 #define USE_MEM_HT32F67051
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 #define LIBCFG_MAX_SPEED                  (60000000)
00038 
00039 #define LIBCFG_FLASH_PAGESIZE             (1024)
00040 
00041 #ifdef USE_MEM_HT32F67041
00042   #define LIBCFG_FLASH_SIZE               (LIBCFG_FLASH_PAGESIZE * 64)
00043   #define LIBCFG_RAM_SIZE                 (1024 * 8)
00044   #define LIBCFG_CHIPNAME                 (0x67041)
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #ifdef USE_MEM_HT32F67051
00048   #define LIBCFG_FLASH_SIZE               (LIBCFG_FLASH_PAGESIZE * 127)
00049   #define LIBCFG_RAM_SIZE                 (1024 * 8)
00050   #define LIBCFG_CHIPNAME                 (0x67051)
00051 #endif
